entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
